ABDULKADIR GOZU TOK  
 
Adress        Y.Mahalle  / Ankara , Turkey  
Gsm            +90 533 0516324 / +90 505 359 00 80  
E-mail         akadirgozutok@yahoo.com  
 
 
 
PROFESSIONAL  EXPERIENCE  
 
ENGINEERING MANAGER, Gama Power Systems                                        10/2015 - Present  
GAMA Pow er is an EPC contractor  in turnkey power generation projects  
 
Managing  the technical scope of the Khabat TPP Project located in Erbil, Iraq, with a capac ity of 
300MW (2x150MW) in total, and Hartha TPP Rehabilitation Project, Unit-1(200 MW) located in 
Basra, Iraq.  
 
 Lead the project engineering team to ensure engineering activities be performed on time, within 
budget and with the required quality  
 Define and allocate  project tasks to the team mem bers, s pecify relevant schedule, cost estimates 
for work in all app licable engineering disciplines  
 Technical coordination with clients and other project partners  
 Supervise  the services carried out by engineering companies under the Engineering Service 
Agre ement s and by the vendors  
 Review and fol low-up of engineering deliverables  to ensure compliance with the commitments 
and the project requirements  
 Collaborate with construction and commissioning teams, clarify potential issues, provid e 
solutions to the problems  
  
DEPUTY PROJE CT DIRECTOR , Bilgin Enerji Holding                                05/2012 – 10/2015  
Bilgin Enerji is a power generation and wholes ale energy trade company  
 
Business development and project management of 900MW Şarköy CCPP  Project  
 
 Manage  the pre -tendering (feasibility study, preparation of tender documents) and tendering 
process of the project  
 Manage  workflows with the owner’s engineering company  
 Review  EPC and LTSA(Long Term Service Agreement) offers an d negoti ate with the bidders  
 Participate  in financial modeling studies (IRR, NPV,Cash flow nalysis,etc.)  
 Coordinate  works with authorities to get project approvals  
  
PLANT MANAGER , Akenerji                                                                             11/2010 - 05/2012  
Akenerji is a power generation  and wholes ale energy trade company   
 
Management of overall Operations and Maintenance (O&M) of CCPP with 132MW capacity  
located in Izmir,Turkey.  
 
 Ensure  entire plant is within corporate goals of sa fety, environmental and regulatory  compliance  
 Prepare  and manag e plant budget  (OPEX , CAPEX ) 
 Manage LTSA and other service contract s 
 Perform  cost analysis,  and take  necessary measures for cost reduction  
 Develop  projects to improve p lant efficiency and flexi bility  
 Evaluate  EHS plans and implement  necessary changes  
 Evaluate risk assessments and take  measures to minimize risks  
 Coordinate  works with local authoriti es to fulfill legal obligations  
 Implement training and qu alification programs for plant personnel  
 
 
LEAD PROJECT ENGINEER , Gama Power Systems                                      04/2008 - 11/2010         
 
Leading Controls and Electrical design team for 4 50MW  Whitegate CCPP Project located in Ireland  
and 420MW Riga District Heating -CCPP Project located i n Latvia  
 
 Manage  Projects’ electrical and I&C e ngineering team  
 Coordin ate the works with the engineering companies  
 Review design documents and ensure they meet customer specifications  
 Prepare purchase contracts  for package systems  
 Review  offers and negotia te with the suppliers  
 Support site construction and commissioning  team  
 
OPERATIONS MANAGER , Hamitabat Elektrik A.Ş.                                       03/2007 -04/2008  
Hamitabat Elektrik A.Ş. is a 1200MW CCPP  with 8 GTs+4STs, located in Luleburgaz/Turk ey 
 
Manag e plant operations  in alignment with Safety, Environmental and corporate policies  
 
 Manage and o versee the daily operations of the  power plant  
 Monitor plant and unit s’ performance, conduct RCA, and lead investigations to develop and 
implement corre ctive actions  
 Set main tenance priorities and schedule  maintenance for the  plant in conjunction with the 
maintenance team  
 Implement computerized machine monitoring t

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
